channel.title: Using PK points instead of Money(coins)
channel.description: How do i make my server want to use pk points? i already have a shop that uses them, i just want to make items use the pk to buy instead of money. how would i do that? where to look? i've looked for hours but never found it :( demise pking source and client, pretty sure its a delta. thank you.

item.title: Using PK points instead of Money(coins)
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

sorry everybody i was at school. i did look at public boolean buyitem and found the shop that uses pk points, currently i’m messing around to try and replace mine with points. but i was reading and a guide would be really cool

i have been messing around with it alot but i cant get it to work. when i go in the shop, the item still says a coin amount and i disconnect when i try to buy something.

Read full topic
item.source: Using PK points instead of Money(coins)

item.title: Using PK points instead of Money(coins)
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:4, topic:361388”]I made a few custom minigames, and I added points to them, and added shops to spend those points on. It’s not impossible. You can see it on my server.

Ontopic:
Do you want me to make a tutorial?[/quote]

its possible and make a tut usman its useful for people
and if you dont know where to start i suggest you search
public boolean buyitem in client.java

Read full topic

item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I made a few custom minigames, and I added points to them, and added shops to spend those points on. It’s not impossible. You can see it on my server.

Ontopic:
Do you want me to make a tutorial?

item.title: Using PK points instead of Money(coins)
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

Sounds impossible, yet nothing is impossible.

~ If you look ~
Now, I’m not absolutely possitive, but if you can find the string where Pk points are connected to the command ::pkrewards… then maybe you can copy it and paste it in the shophandler file or something, not absolutely possitive, so please don’t get mad if I’m dead wrong. =)
Good luck. If I’m wrong, just bump the topic.
